name: The Globenhausser Legacy
description:
DEFEND YOUR FACTORY!!

Your families' wrench factory has fallen into disrepair! You can't just let down thousands of generations of aliens like that! Kill aliens that grow here, and pass down genes through your bloodline to save the factory!

By using the powers of a radioactive wrench, pass down the genes best fit for winning this ancestral war!

CONTROLS:

Use WASD to move your character around the factory and left click to attack the baddies! If it so happens you die, select a stat to pass down to your children.

Made for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019 with the themes Wrenches 101 and DNA Chaos.

ACHIEVMENTS:

Tango:  This game was made by Jovan and Keith Bartlett, 2 people
